short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly share links via QR code

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your Best companion for sharing links with ease.

QRLinkify is made to share links experience extremely easy and simplified.
This extension is made in conjunction with a feature rich lightning fast Android application (Available at PlayStore) although it should work with any other application as well. Main objective of this extension is to share links and but is also capable of generating QR code for any input data on the fly.
